alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, central Walton, southwestern Holmes and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 715 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Marianna to 6 miles southeast of Vernon to 8 miles south of De Funiak Springs. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Chipley, Bonifay, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Moose Pond, Whitehead Crossroads, Camps Head, Rock Hill, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry and Bennett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
